,

order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into task (task_id, task_name, task_createtime, task_finishtime, task_user, task_assigner, status, task_describe) values (#{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskFinishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskAssigner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

update task
task_id = #{record.taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_name = #{record.taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_createtime = #{record.taskCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

task_finishtime = #{taskFinishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
